Name: Aberration Hunters' Amulet
Description:
Advantage on Intelligence Saving Throws if you are Githyanki. 
Advantage on Attack Rolls against aberrations and aberrations have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against you.

Name: Absolute's Talisman
Description:
Advantage on Death Saving Throws if you bear the Absolute's Brand
Cast Aid once per Long Rest. This casting of Aid only affects the caster.

Name: Absolute's Warboard
Description:
Gain a +1 bonus to Saving Throws if you bear the Absolute's Brand.
Cast Heroism once per Long Rest.

Name: Abyss Beckoners
Description:
Your summoned creatures have resistance to all damage except Psychic.
At the start of your summoned creature's turn, it must succed a Wisdom Saving Throw or be driven Mad.

Name: Adamantine Longsword
Description:
This weapon ignores Resistance to Slashing damage.
If you hit an object with this weapon, the hit is always Critical.
